link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 睡眠定时器在 Android 14 及以上版本上可能失效
  2. 修复 列表最后一项被导航栏挡住
  3. 修复 速度控制对话框导致崩溃
  4. 修复 通过多选操作内部数据库播放列表时崩溃
  5. 修复 更改某些设置后由于主播放器导致偶尔崩溃
  6. 修改 默认播放器按钮设置
  7. 改进 支持导出内部数据库播放列表
  8. 翻译 更新 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo), 匈牙利语 (Balázs Meskó)
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Sleep timer possibly not working on Android 14 and above
  2. Fix: last item behind navigation bar due to edge-to-edge
  3. Fix: crash due to Speed Control dialog
  4. Fix: crash when operating internal database playlists via multi-selection
  5. Fix: occasional crash due to Main Player after some settings changed
  6. Modify: default player buttons settings
  7. Improve: support for exporting internal database playlists
  8. Translation: update Brazilian Portuguese (by FalaTudo), Hungarian (by Balázs Meskó)

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 切换随机播放模式时偶尔会随机更改封面
  2. 修复 播放列表详情中多选菜单无响应的问题
  3. 修复 在文件夹页面中更改排序顺序后偶尔内容不正确
  4. 修复 设置和横版主播放器边到边界面问题
  5. 修复 通知上的快进和快退失效
  6. 修复 主播放器中主色调变化动画
  7. 改进 提高图像加载性能
  8. 改进 支持文件夹页面的自定义网格大小和布局
  9. 改进 重新组织分类设置项目，并使用二级页面
  10. 改进 添加“起始目录”设置的入口，展开路径过滤器设置
  11. 改进 重新设计主播放器，支持更灵活样式选择和支持自定义按钮
  12. 改进 主播放器播放队列顶部附近添加随机模式和循环模式按钮
  13. 修改 将播放队列相关菜单项移播放队列顶部菜单
  14. 修改 禁止从 v1.7.0 之前的版本升级，警告从 v1.8.4 之前的版本升级
  15. 新增 实验性基于内部数据库存储的播放列表 (在宣告稳定前，不保证其可用性和兼容性)
  16. 移除 选项 图片预加载
  17. 翻译 更新 波兰语 (cooky), 匈牙利语 (Balázs Úr & Balázs Meskó)
  18. 开发 更新依赖, 更新 Kotlin 至 2.1.20, 更新 AGP 至 8.9.2
  19. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: randomly changing artwork occasionally when toggling shuffle mode
  2. Fix: no response of Playlist Detail multi-selection menu
  3. Fix: occasionally incorrect folder content after changing sort order in Folders Page
  4. Fix: edge-to-edge in Settings and horizontal Main Player
  5. Fix: forward and rewind from notification
  6. Fix: broken color animation in Main Player
  7. Improve: improve performance of image loading
  8. Improve: support custom grid size and layout for Folders Page
  9. Improve: reorganize items in Settings, support secondary pages
  10. Improve: add entrance of Start Directory settings, flatten path filter settings
  11. Improve: slightly redesign Main Player, with more flexible styles and more customizable buttons
  12. Improve: add shuffle mode and repeat mode buttons near to Playing Queue header in Main Player
  13. Modify: move relative menu items to Playing Queue menu in Main Player
  14. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.7.0 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.8.4
  15. New: experimental playlists in internal database (no guarantee of its availability and compatibility in future till it reaches a stable state)
  16. Remove: preference Preload Images
  17. Translation: update Polish (by cooky), Hungarian (by Balázs Úr & Balázs Meskó)
  18. Development: update dependencies, upgrade Kotlin to 2.1.20, upgrade AGP to 8.9.2
  19. Development: cleanup codes
